resources.string: Add your user HMAC secret to the clipboard to mange other probes or just to put somewhere for safe keeping

IT IS STRONGLY RECOMMENDED YOU DO NOT USE THIS APP UNLESS YOU FULLY UNDERSTAND THE IMPLICATIONS

If you click "I agree" this app will possibly receive URLs that lead to censored or illegal content.

The app will only make a HTTP HEAD request so content (legal or otherwise) should not be downloaded (as per RFC2616) but there is still the possibility of repercussions.

By agreeing to use this app you indemnify the author of any liability.

This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
Thank you for helping to make the Internet more accountable!
To participate in the Open Rights Group Censorship Monitoring Project ( http://bit.ly/18B4e8Y ) tap \"Generate Probe HMAC Secret\" which\'ll register this probe.
To better profile which ISPs are censoring and which aren\'t it is useful to have meta data about the ISP used to check URLs.
This WiFi network hasn\'t been seen before, checking what it is?
Receive URL check requests and process them automatically
Receive URL checks through Google Cloud Messaging
Receive poll prompts via Google Cloud Messaging but poll for URL details
Do not use Google Cloud Messaging at all, poll for new URLs only

-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----
Add your existing private key here if you have one

-----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----
To help keep track of probe registrations please create an account.
Your account is configured and ready to register probes!
